sentences.en: " Untie the knot and take the bucket to the wagon and give them some.
sentences.cn: " 把绳子解开,把吊桶提到马车上去,让他们也喝一点.

sentences.en: But this weak knot they will full soon untie.
sentences.cn: 这个松松的结,他们很快解散.

sentences.en: Her shoelaces were frozen together and he helped her to untie them.
sentences.cn: 她的鞋带被冻在一起,他帮她解开.

sentences.en: It's just impossible to untie the knot, it's too tight.
sentences.cn: 这个结根本解不开, 太紧了.
赶快把绑住我的手的绳子解开。

sentences.en: My dead fingers could not untie the knot.
sentences.cn: 我的手指麻木了,解不开结.

sentences.en: Slack the rope before trying to untie the knot.
sentences.cn: 解结之前先将绳索放松.

sentences.en: Step 5: Untie the Figure of Eight knot from the rope.
sentences.cn: 第五步: 从绳端解开八字结.

sentences.en: The ropes were entangled so I was not able to untie the parcel.
sentences.cn: 绳子缠在一起了,所以我没能解开包裹.

sentences.en: The thread has got all snarled up; I can't untie it.
sentences.cn: 线都乱成一团了, 我解不开了.

sentences.en: They talked about is one of problems we must untie today.
sentences.cn: 你们所谈得只是我们今天要解决的问题之一.

sentences.en: They're excellent bed warmers, and small fingers can untie hopeless knots.
sentences.cn: 他们是很优秀的床上取暖器, 小手指可以解开无望解开的结.

sentences.en: Untie the handrail rope. Get ready the fenders.
sentences.cn: 解开扶手绳, 准备好护舷的垫子.

sentences.en: Untie the knot and the bucket the wagon and give them some.
sentences.cn: 把绳子解开,把吊桶提到马车上去,让他们也喝一点.

trans.tran_en: to take the knots out of something, or unfasten something that has been tied

trans.tran_cn: 松开，解开，被解开（或解下）
解除，使自由，解决，使解脱
